General.Name: Shandong Polymer Biochemicals Co Ltd
General.Description: Shandong Polymer Biochemicals Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells special chemicals for oil and gas exploitation in China and internationally. The company offers monomers, surface active agent, and polymers. It also provides oil field stimulation and oil recovery technical services; and environmental protection water treatment products and technical services. Shandong Polymer Biochemicals Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Dongying, China.
